name: OVERKILL (itch) (Shaishav Pathak)
description:
-----

Smooth, fast combat? Check.

Quick, responsive, tight movement? Check.

An ability that lets you slow time? Got it.

A variety of different enemies to fight? Bet.

Fantastic, colorful, futuristic visuals? Got that too.

Three difficulty options, each adding new enemies?

Two extra bonus modes?

A fun and rewarding score and high score system?

A soundtrack that F*CKIN' SLAPS?

ARE YOU SOLD YET?

-----

Overkill is an easy-to-learn, hard-to-master FPS in which you have just one goal: survive endlessly randomized waves of foes, annihilate your enemies, and beat your High Score.

Featuring a gun that fires a piercing shot, a Slomo ability, and a plethora of different enemies with unique AIs and behaviors to slaughter, Overkill is chaotically fun.
